text: Senichi Suzuki from the NTT Corporation, Kanagawa, Japan was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for contributions to high-density integrated silica-based planar lightwave circuits for optical communications. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Senichi Suzuki
